bt.data

Class DataDescriptorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.data.DataDescriptorFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataDescriptorFactory

    public class DataDescriptorFactory
extends Object
implements IDataDescriptorFactory

    Note that this class implements a service. Hence, is not a part of the public API and is a subject to change.

      DataDescriptor createDescriptor(Torrent torrent, Storage storage)
      Create a data descriptor for a given torrent with the storage provided as the data back-end.

    • Method Detail

      • createDescriptor

        public DataDescriptor createDescriptor(Torrent torrent,
                                       Storage storage)
        Description copied from interface: IDataDescriptorFactory
        Create a data descriptor for a given torrent with the storage provided as the data back-end. It's up to implementations to decide, whether storage units will be allocated eagerly upon creation of data descriptor or delayed until data access is requested.
        Specified by:
        createDescriptor in interface IDataDescriptorFactory
        Returns:
        Data descriptor
